annotations.description: Exposes and load balances the application pods
Keeps track of changes in the application image
Defines how to build the application
Defines how to deploy the application server

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory the container can use.

parameters.name: DOTNET_IMAGE_STREAM_TAG
parameters.description: The image stream tag which is used to build the code.

parameters.name: NAMESPACE
parameters.description: The OpenShift Namespace where the ImageStream resides.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_URL
parameters.description: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_REF
parameters.description: Set this to a branch name, tag or other ref of your repository if you are not using the default branch.

parameters.name: CONTEXT_DIR
parameters.description: Set this to use a subdirectory of the source code repository

parameters.name: APPLICATION_DOMAIN
parameters.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the .NET Core service, if left blank a value will be defaulted.

parameters.name: GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: A secret string used to configure the GitHub webhook.

parameters.name: GENERIC_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: A secret string used to configure the Generic webhook.

parameters.name: DOTNET_STARTUP_PROJECT
parameters.description: Set this to a project file (e.g. csproj) or a folder containing a single project file.

parameters.name: DOTNET_PUBLISH_READYTORUN
parameters.description: Set this to 'true' to perform an ahead-of-time compilation.

parameters.name: DOTNET_ASSEMBLY_NAME
parameters.description: Set this when the assembly name is overridden in the project file.

parameters.name: DOTNET_TOOLS
parameters.description: Set this to a space separated list of .NET tools needed to publish.

parameters.name: DOTNET_NPM_TOOLS
parameters.description: Set this to a space separated list of npm tools needed to publish.

parameters.name: DOTNET_TEST_PROJECTS
parameters.description: Set this to a space separated list of test projects to run before publishing.

parameters.name: DOTNET_RESTORE_SOURCES
parameters.description: Set this to override the NuGet.config sources. Cannot be combined with DOTNET_RESTORE_CONFIGFILE.

parameters.name: DOTNET_RESTORE_CONFIGFILE
parameters.description: Set this to a Nuget.Config file. Cannot be combined with DOTNET_RESTORE_SOURCES.
